item.title: Setting Up CI/CD to Netlify for Static Sites via Github
item.description: Description I. Introduction II. Setting Up a Netlify Account III. Setting Up CI/CD to Netlify Configuring the Build Settings on Netlify Configuring the Deployment Settings on Netlify IV. Setting Up CI/CD with Github Actions Introduction to Github Actions Creating a Github Actions Workflow for the Static Site Configuring the Workflow to Deploy to Netlify V. Best Practices for CI/CD with Netlify and Github VI. Troubleshooting CI/CD Issues VII. Conclusion Description This article provides step-by-step instructions on how to set up continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) to Netlify for static site deployments using Github.
